information: The company WEINGUT GEHEIMER RAT DR. VON BASSERMANN-JORDAN GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1998, which operates in the Champagne and sparkling wines industry. It also operates in the Wines, sparkling, and Fruit industries. It is based in Deidesheim, Germany.
